iService theme template

var defTop "top" script element

var defTop = document.getElementById("def-top");
defTop.outerHTML = wet.builder.top({
    "cdnEnv": "esdcprod",
    "subTheme": "esdc",
    "GCToolsModal" : true,
    "lngLinks": [{
        "lang": "fr",
        "href": "subtheme-iservice-fr.shtml",
        "text": "Français"
    }],
    "intranetTitle": [{
        "href": "http://esdc.prv/en/index.shtml",
        "text": " iService IntraWeb",
        "boldText" : "ESDC/SC",
        "acronym": "Employment and Social Development Canada / Service Canada"
    }],
    "customSearch": [{
        "action" : "http://hrsdc.prv/cgi-bin/rhdcc-hrsdc/recherche-search.aspx", // Mandatory
        "placeholder" : "Search the IntraWeb", // Optional 
        "method" : "get", // Mandatory "get" or "post"
        "hiddenInput" : [{
            "name" : "k",
            "value" : "en"
        }, {
            "name" : "l",
            "value" : "eng"
        }, {
            "name" : "chk2",
            "value" : "True"
        }] // Optional
    }]
});
